doc:
Karen Sharpe https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karen_Sharpe 0 Karen Kay Sharpe (born September 20, 1934) is an American former actress of film and television, who appeared on screen from 1952 to 1966. She is the surviving third wife of producer/director Stanley Kramer, to whom she was married from 1966 until his death in 2001. She has since been the caretaker of the Kramer estate and legacy. Karen_Kay_Sharpe ( born September_20_,_1934 ) is an_American_former_actress of film_and_television , who appeared on screen from 1952 to 1966 . She is the_surviving_third_wife of producer/director_Stanley_Kramer , to whom she was_married from 1966 until his_death in 2001 . She has_since_been the_caretaker of the_Kramer_estate_and_legacy .
